Serama.Description: A new breed from Malaysia designed for racing. Fast, nimble, and hard to hit. Few available, strong racers.

Sultan.Description: Spicy Sultans have a Distance Preference for Long races (180/200m) with a stronger Distance Preference Strength. Enduring racers from Ottoman Empire palaces.

Lakenvelder.Description: Chaotic breed from Europe, true origins unclear. Talented, tenacious, with a wild nature. Bonus: Spicy Lakenvelder's Talent Preference matches Talent type.

Dorking.Description: Old British breed, sturdy and steadfast, does well on home turf. Bonus: Spicy Dorkings have a stronger Terrain Preference Strength.

Stock.Description: A chickenâ€™s stock is a rough guide to what generation the chicken belongs to. As chickens are bred or fused, they lower in stock.There are 6 stocks: Spicy, Robust, Fresh, Crisp, Tender, Bland. Spicy chickens are generally stronger, but not always so. Stock is only one of the factors that will determine a chicken's performance during a race. With smart breeding and fusion, you can create offspring that are stronger than their parents.

Perfection.Description: Each chicken has a perfection score, from 1% to 100%. A 100% perfect chicken is a top performer of the highest caliber. A 100% perfect chicken will usually beat a similar 99% perfect chicken. But given the right circumstances, the 99% perfect chicken can win, as no chicken is truly perfect.

Beak.Description: Rare beak accessories: Vampire Teeth (offensive talent buff) and Beak Ring (resistance to offensive talents).

Stripes.Description: Stripes provide an edge in races.

Talents.Description: Unique race abilities of a chicken, ranging from weapons to magic and technology.

Common Talents.Name: Chickenapult
Common Talents.Description: Send messages quickly with a Chickenapult.

Common Talents.Name: CK-47
Common Talents.Description: Fire rounds to slow down competitors.

Common Talents.Name: Growth
Common Talents.Description: Quadruple in size for a speed advantage.

Common Talents.Name: Machete
Common Talents.Description: Wildly wield a machete to decapitate opponents.

Common Talents.Name: Rollerblades
Common Talents.Description: Gain a burst of speed and glide forward.

Uncommon Talents.Name: Blue Egg
Uncommon Talents.Description: Seek out a leading chicken and take them down.

Uncommon Talents.Name: Dig
Uncommon Talents.Description: Burrow through the ground to sneak up on the lead.

Uncommon Talents.Name: Fan Group
Uncommon Talents.Description: Gain speed to escape enthusiastic fans.

Uncommon Talents.Name: Helicopter
Uncommon Talents.Description: Call down a metal bird for airlift and homing missiles.

Uncommon Talents.Name: Jetpack
Uncommon Talents.Description: Use a high-speed jetpack for acceleration.

Rare Talents.Name: Cold Snap
Rare Talents.Description: Freeze nearby chickens in their tracks.

Rare Talents.Name: Devolution
Rare Talents.Description: Revert to a prehistoric form and charge ahead with help from the pack.

Rare Talents.Name: Moving Walkway
Rare Talents.Description: Turn the lane into a luxury moving walkway for recovery and speed.

Very Rare Talents.Name: Black Hole
Very Rare Talents.Description: Unleash a powerful black hole to suck in opponents.

Very Rare Talents.Name: Royal Procession
Very Rare Talents.Description: Guide your chicken to victory with a golden horse-drawn carriage.

Hidden Talents.Name: Feather Rain
Hidden Talents.Description: Hail storm of feathers rain down to pierce opponents.

Hidden Talents.Name: Runic Blink
Hidden Talents.Description: Transform into pure energy to surge forward.
